trans-unit.source: Explore data in Hive tables with Hive queries | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Explore data in Hive tables with Hive queries | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Explore data in Hive tables using Hive queries.
trans-unit.target: Explore data in Hive tables using Hive queries.

trans-unit.source: Explore data in Hive tables with Hive queries
trans-unit.target: Explore data in Hive tables with Hive queries

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: Introduction

trans-unit.source: This document provides sample Hive scripts that are used to explore data in Hive tables.
trans-unit.target: This document provides sample Hive scripts that are used to explore data in Hive tables.

trans-unit.source: The **menu** below links to topics that describe how to use tools to explore data from various storage environments.
trans-unit.target: The **menu** below links to topics that describe how to use tools to explore data from various storage environments.

trans-unit.source: This task is a step in the Cortana Analytics Process (CAP).
trans-unit.target: This task is a step in the Cortana Analytics Process (CAP).

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This article assumes that you have:
trans-unit.target: This article assumes that you have:

trans-unit.source: Created an Azure storage account.
trans-unit.target: Created an Azure storage account.

trans-unit.source: If you need instructions, see [Create an Azure Storage account](../hdinsight-get-started.md#storage)
trans-unit.target: If you need instructions, see [Create an Azure Storage account](../hdinsight-get-started.md#storage)

trans-unit.source: Provisioned a customized Hadoop cluster with the HDInsight service.
trans-unit.target: Provisioned a customized Hadoop cluster with the HDInsight service.

trans-unit.source: If you need instructions, see [Customize Azure HDInsight Hadoop Clusters for Advanced Analytics](machine-learning-data-science-customize-hadoop-cluster.md).
trans-unit.target: If you need instructions, see [Customize Azure HDInsight Hadoop Clusters for Advanced Analytics](machine-learning-data-science-customize-hadoop-cluster.md).

trans-unit.source: The data has been uploaded to Hive tables in Azure HDInsight Hadoop clusters.
trans-unit.target: The data has been uploaded to Hive tables in Azure HDInsight Hadoop clusters.

trans-unit.source: If it has not, please follow [Create and load data to Hive tables](machine-learning-data-science-move-hive-tables.md) to upload data to Hive tables first.
trans-unit.target: If it has not, please follow [Create and load data to Hive tables](machine-learning-data-science-move-hive-tables.md) to upload data to Hive tables first.

trans-unit.source: Enabled remote access to the cluster.
trans-unit.target: Enabled remote access to the cluster.

trans-unit.source: If you need instructions, see [Access the Head Node of Hadoop Cluster](machine-learning-data-science-customize-hadoop-cluster.md#headnode).
trans-unit.target: If you need instructions, see [Access the Head Node of Hadoop Cluster](machine-learning-data-science-customize-hadoop-cluster.md#headnode).

trans-unit.source: If you need instructions on how to submit Hive queries, see [How to Submit Hive Queries](machine-learning-data-science-move-hive-tables.md#submit)
trans-unit.target: If you need instructions on how to submit Hive queries, see [How to Submit Hive Queries](machine-learning-data-science-move-hive-tables.md#submit)

trans-unit.source: Example Hive query scripts for data exploration
trans-unit.target: Example Hive query scripts for data exploration

trans-unit.source: Get the count of observations per partition `SELECT <partitionfieldname>, count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by <partitionfieldname>;`
trans-unit.target: Get the count of observations per partition `SELECT <partitionfieldname>, count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by <partitionfieldname>;`

trans-unit.source: Get the count of observations per day `SELECT to_date(<date_columnname>), count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by to_date(<date_columnname>);`
trans-unit.target: Get the count of observations per day `SELECT to_date(<date_columnname>), count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by to_date(<date_columnname>);`

trans-unit.source: Get the levels in a categorical column `SELECT distinct <column_name> from <databasename>.<tablename>`
trans-unit.target: Get the levels in a categorical column `SELECT distinct <column_name> from <databasename>.<tablename>`

trans-unit.source: Get the number of levels in combination of two categorical columns `SELECT <column_a>, <column_b>, count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by <column_a>, <column_b>`
trans-unit.target: Get the number of levels in combination of two categorical columns `SELECT <column_a>, <column_b>, count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by <column_a>, <column_b>`

trans-unit.source: Get the distribution for numerical columns `SELECT <column_name>, count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by <column_name>`
trans-unit.target: Get the distribution for numerical columns `SELECT <column_name>, count(*) from <databasename>.<tablename> group by <column_name>`

trans-unit.source: Extract records from joining two tables
trans-unit.target: Extract records from joining two tables

trans-unit.source: Additional query scripts for taxi trip data scenarios
trans-unit.target: Additional query scripts for taxi trip data scenarios

trans-unit.source: Examples of queries that are specific to [NYC Taxi Trip Data](http://chriswhong.com/open-data/foil_nyc_taxi/) scenarios are also provided in [Github repository](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-MachineLearning-DataScience/tree/master/Misc/DataScienceProcess/DataScienceScripts).
trans-unit.target: Examples of queries that are specific to [NYC Taxi Trip Data](http://chriswhong.com/open-data/foil_nyc_taxi/) scenarios are also provided in [Github repository](https://github.com/Azure/Azure-MachineLearning-DataScience/tree/master/Misc/DataScienceProcess/DataScienceScripts).

trans-unit.source: These queries already have data schema specified and are ready to be submitted to run.
trans-unit.target: These queries already have data schema specified and are ready to be submitted to run.
